t: Amazon Fresh - Moorpark, CA - Hours & Weekly Ad
s: Amazon Fresh can be found in a convenient location at 742 New Los Angeles Avenue, in the south-east part of Moorpark (by Moorpark Marketplace). This grocery store essentially serves people from the locales of Newbury Park, Simi Valley, Thousand Oaks, Somis, Oak Park, Camarillo and Fillmore.
